documentation.text: @notice Current prize balance (native ETH on zkSync)

@notice Allow the creator to top-up the prize pool after deployment (optional).
 If later you want public funding, remove the onlyCreator check or gate it by a flag.

addQuestion(string,string[],uint8).notice: Add a question before the survey starts

fundPrize().notice: Allow the creator to top-up the prize pool after deployment (optional). If later you want public funding, remove the onlyCreator check or gate it by a flag.

prizeBalance().notice: Current prize balance (native ETH on zkSync)

sweepPrize(address).notice: Sweep remaining prize (e.g., to a payout module or back to the creator) after finalize.
